rules.text: Be Respectful, Content that is racist, sexist, hateful, nasty or discriminatory is not welcome.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Sexually explicit ,violent  or sensitive media must be marked as such when posting
No spam , Excessive promotion  , Porn , S**t Posting or Second Life locally on Cupoftea.social
No accounts setup purely to sell something / Fake Engagement (Such As Investments/NFT/Cryptos/Wealth stuff) There has to be a human element in your posting.
Please use the correct posting language setting for your language so others can translate

records.text: “Strength is the only virtue recognized by the powerful. And to those who use spears and clubs, power is muscle and physical speed. All else is worthless, for in their insular worlds they cannot imagine any other form of strength, mostly because they lack the capacity to imagine”Excerpt from #Esrahaddon b Michael J Sullivan. So relevant in this age of toxic masculinity and the #Manosphere nonsense. #Books #Bookstodon
